attributes.action: to stop the major record companies from being able to put pressure on the radio to create the playlists that they want.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the bbc as you know is funded by the public through a licensing system,yet the big 3or4 major labels seem to be able to manipulate that by putting some form of pressure on to play their artists more than anyone else,thus in turn gives them control of the market and the charts.this is not what the license payers pay for,,we pay so we can hear what we want,not what they want.there are artists out there who don't get enough airplay because of this,and deserve it more than most of the label manufactured rubbish that is forced onto us.so please make radio fairer.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
